name: Wild Magic
description: Barbarians whose rage is suffused with unpredictable magic, producing chaotic effects.

3.name: Magic Awareness
3.description: As an action, sense the location of spells or magic items within 60 feet until the end of your next turn. Uses equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

3.name: Wild Surge
3.description: When you enter your rage, roll on the Wild Magic table to determine a magical effect.

6.name: Bolstering Magic
6.description: As an action, touch a creature to add a d3 to its attack rolls and ability checks for 10 minutes or restore a spell slot of level d3 or lower. Uses equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

10.name: Unstable Backlash
10.description: When you take damage or fail a saving throw while raging, use your reaction to roll on the Wild Magic table again, replacing the current effect.

14.name: Controlled Surge
14.description: Whenever you roll on the Wild Magic table, you can roll twice and choose either result; if both are the same, choose any effect on the table.
